txt.en: Two scouts reach for their weapons, but the third shakes her head to stop them

'Riderch sent a duvodiad to check on us? Tch! Has he no faith?'

With no Riderch to glare at, the woman settles for the next best thing: glaring at you. A few seconds pass before she relents and sighs.

'Perhaps I am being... too hasty, as he would say. If you truly intend to aid us, then I'll allow it.'
Riderch has asked you to look for his fellow scouts near Nímbarth.\n\nNímbarth is located north-east of Stonecrop Encampment.
An injured Dunlending scout has been separated from his kinsmen.

'Have you seen my kinsmen nearby? I'd go looking myself, but...' He gestures to his bandages and smiles wryly. 'After what happened in Nímbarth, I doubt they would enjoy rescuing me again.

'Could you make sure they are all right? They should have returned to Nímbarth by now, to the north-east.

'Our leader is a woman named Meriona. You'll have to forgive her and the others for being wary around you -- that's just how things are with them.'
You have found the Dunlendings near Nímbarth.\n\nYou should talk to their leader, Meriona.
